1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Content expressions in relmap attributes.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Base.Get.Cox
6  ( -- * Cox
7    getCox, getMaybeCox, getOptionCox,
8    getTermCoxes,
9    getNamedCoxes,
10    getWhere,
11  
12    -- * Content
13    getContent, getContents,
14    getOptContent,
15    getFiller,
16  
17    getInt,
18  ) where
19
20import Prelude hiding (getContents)
21import qualified Koshucode.Baala.DataPlus          as K
22import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Core              as C
23import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.Pattern    as P
24import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Base.Get.Get  as Rop
25import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Base.Get.Rel  as Rop
26import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Base.Message  as Msg
27
28
29-- --------------------------------------------  Cox
30
31-- | Get relmap attribute as single cox.
32getCox :: (K.CContent c) => Rop.RopGet c (K.Cox c)
33getCox med = ropBuild med . K.ttreeGroup K.<.> Rop.getTrees med
34
35-- | Get optional content expression with default content.
36getOptionCox :: (K.CContent c) => c -> Rop.RopGet c (K.Cox c)
37getOptionCox c = Rop.getOption (K.CoxLit [] c) getCox
38
39-- | Get optional content expression.
40getMaybeCox :: (K.CContent c) => Rop.RopGet c (Maybe (K.Cox c))
41getMaybeCox = Rop.getMaybe getCox
42
43-- | Get relmap attribute as cox list with name.
44getNamedCoxes :: (K.CContent c) => Rop.RopGet c [K.NamedCox c]
45getNamedCoxes med = ropNamedAlphas med K.<.> Rop.getWordTrees med 
46
47-- | Get relmap attribute as cox list with term name.
48getTermCoxes :: (K.CContent c) => Rop.RopGet c [K.Term (K.Cox c)]
49getTermCoxes med = ropNamedAlphas med K.<.> Rop.getTermTrees med
50
51ropBuild :: (K.CContent c) => C.Intmed c -> K.Tree -> K.Ab (K.Cox c)
52ropBuild = C.treeCoxG . C.ropGlobal
53
54ropNamedAlphas :: (K.CContent c) => C.Intmed c -> [(n, K.Tree)] -> K.Ab [(n, K.Cox c)]
55ropNamedAlphas med = mapM (K.sndM $ ropBuild med)
56
57
58-- --------------------------------------------  Where
59
60-- | Get where attribute as operator set.
61getWhere :: (K.CContent c) => Rop.RopGet c (K.CopSet c)
62getWhere u name =
63    do wh <- Rop.getOption [] getWhereBody u name
64       let copset = C.globalCopset $ C.ropGlobal u
65       Right $ copset { K.copsetDerived = wh }
66
67getWhereBody :: (K.CContent c) => Rop.RopGet c [K.NamedCox c]
68getWhereBody u name =
69    do xs <- Rop.getTreesByColon u name
70       getWhereClause u `mapM` xs
71
72getWhereClause :: (K.CContent c) => C.Intmed c -> [K.Tree] -> K.Ab (K.NamedCox c)
73getWhereClause u trees =
74    do (he, bo) <- getTreesByEqual trees
75       (n, vs)  <- getWhereHead he
76       cox      <- ropBuild u $ K.ttreeGroup bo
77       let cp = K.getCPs $ head $ K.untrees trees
78       case vs of
79         [] -> Right (n, cox)
80         _  -> Right (n, K.coxForm cp (Just n) vs cox)
81
82getWhereHead :: [K.Tree] -> K.Ab (String, [String])
83getWhereHead [] = Msg.adlib "getWhereHead"
84getWhereHead (n : vs) =
85    do n'  <- getTextFromTree n
86       vs' <- mapM getTextFromTree vs
87       Right (n', vs')
88
89getTreesByEqual :: [K.Tree] -> K.Ab ([K.Tree], [K.Tree])
90getTreesByEqual trees =
91    case K.divideTreesByEqual trees of
92      [left, right] -> Right (left, right)
93      _             -> Msg.adlib "getTreesByEqual"
94
95getTextFromTree :: K.Tree -> K.Ab String
96getTextFromTree (P.LRaw n) = Right n
97getTextFromTree _ = Msg.adlib "getTextFromTree"
98
99
100
101
102-- --------------------------------------------  Content
103
104-- | Get relmap attribute as calculated content.
105getContent :: (K.CContent c) => Rop.RopGet c c
106getContent med name =
107    do tree <- Rop.getTree med name
108       calcTree med tree
109
110-- | Get relmap attribute as list of calculated contents.
111getContents :: (K.CContent c) => Rop.RopGet c [c]
112getContents med name =
113    do trees <- Rop.getTrees med name
114       let trees2 = K.ttreeGroup `map` K.divideTreesByColon trees
115       calcTree med `mapM` trees2
116
117calcTree :: (K.CContent c) => C.Intmed c -> K.CalcContent c
118calcTree = K.calcContent . C.ropCopset
119
120-- | Get relmap attribute as optional content.
121getOptContent :: (K.CContent c) => c -> Rop.RopGet c c
122getOptContent opt = Rop.getOption opt getContent
123
124-- | Get relmap attribute as filler content, i.e., given content or empty.
125getFiller :: (K.CContent c) => Rop.RopGet c c
126getFiller = getOptContent K.empty
127
128-- | Get decimal integer content.
129getInt :: (K.CContent c) => Rop.RopGet c K.DecimalInteger
130getInt med name =
131    do dec <- K.getDec $ getContent med name
132       Right $ K.decimalNum dec
133
